snippet.title: Behind the scenes of GS: preventing and curing Dans les coulisses de GS : prévenir et guérir
snippet.description: Behind the scenes of GS: preventing and curing Dans les coulisses de GS : prévenir et guérir / Anaïs Schaeffer With about 10,000 persons on the site every day, CERN’s infrastructure takes a real hammering every day of the year. Fortunately, the GS-SE Group is on the watch… Here, like everywhere else, nothing stays shiny and new for very long [...] BUL-NA-2014-027.- 2014 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 08/2014 09/2014

snippet.title: The elegant lines of the new Building 774 Quelle ligne !
snippet.description: The elegant lines of the new Building 774 Quelle ligne ! / Anaïs Schaeffer Prévessin will shortly see an addition to its stock of buildings. Functional, elegant and in compliance with the latest regulations regarding energy consumption, it will bring a modern touch to CERN’s French site. [...] BUL-NA-2012-278.- 2012 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 35/2012 36/2012 Fulltext: 774_2_image \- JPG; 774_1_image \- JPG; 774_3_image \- JPG;

snippet.title: “I like to be useful, it’s just the way I am”: Interview with Cristoforo Benvenuti « J’aime être utile, je suis comme ça » - entretien avec Cristoforo Benvenuti
snippet.description: “I like to be useful, it’s just the way I am”: Interview with Cristoforo Benvenuti « J’aime être utile, je suis comme ça » - entretien avec Cristoforo Benvenuti / Joannah Caborn Wengler Cristoforo Benvenuti knows a lot about CERN, having been here since 1966. He also knows an awful lot about vacuum technology and getters, which he developed for ISR, LEP and LHC at CERN and which is an integral part of the revolutionary new solar panels he has invented. [...] BUL-NA-2012-093.- 2012 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 12/2012 13/2012 Fulltext: CrisBenvenuti_1_image \- PNG; CrisBenvenuti_image \- PNG;

snippet.title: Vibration Problems ICOVP-2007
snippet.description: Vibration Problems ICOVP-2007 / İnan, Esin This volume presents the Proceedings of the 8th International Conference on Vibration Problems, held from 30 January 2007 to 3 February 2007, in Howrah, Kolkata, West Bengal, India [...] Dordrecht : Springer, 2009. (Springer Proceedings in Physics ; 126)

snippet.title: TECHNICAL COORDINATION
snippet.description: TECHNICAL COORDINATION / A. Ball ; W. Zeuner Operational Experience At the end of the first full-year running period of LHC, CMS is established as a reliable, robust and mature experiment. In particular common systems and infrastructure faults accounted for <0.6 % CMS downtime during LHC pp physics [...] CMSBUL-ARTICLE-2010-044.- 2010 \- Published in : , no. 3/2010, pp. 2

snippet.title: Making more space for more people Accroître nos capacités d’accueil
snippet.description:
Making more space for more people Accroître nos capacités d’accueil /
The upcoming operation of the LHC is attracting and will continue to attract more and more researchers. To ensure that we are able to cope with this influx, our technical services have been busy increasing the office space available on the CERN site [...] BUL-NA-2009-324; 39/2009; 40/2009.- 2009 \- Published in : CERN Bulletin 39/2009 40/2009
